azure_region.description: Azure region where the deployment machines will be created

administration_user.description: Administration user used to create the machines

ssh_public_key_location.description: file_key: Path to a SSH public key used to connect to the created machines

ssh_private_key_location.description: file_key: Path to a SSH private key used to connect to the created machines

scc_registration_code.description: Password, Optional: If informed, register the product using SUSEConnect. If it's not set PAYG images will be used

scc_registration_email.description: Optional: Email used in the SUSEConnect registration

system_identifier.description: HANA system identifier. Pattern=["^[a-zA-Z]{3}$", "System identifier must be 3 letters string"]

instance_number.description: HANA system instance number. Pattern=["^[0-9]{2}$", "Instance number must be 2 digits string"]

primary_site_name.description: Optional. Primary site name for the case where sytsem replication is enabled

secondary_site_name.description: Optional. Secondary site name for the case where sytsem replication is enabled

deployment_type.description: Select between HA (SAP HANA system replication and HA capabilities) or non HA deployment. Options=["HA","non HA"]

instance_type.description: Only used to create the 'Size cluster' page

sles4sap_version.description: Select the sles4sap version for the machines. Options=["SLES15", "SLES15SP1", "SLES15SP2"].

hana_installation_software_path.description: Azure storage account file share where HANA installation platform is available

storage_account_name.description: Azure storage account where the file share is located

storage_account_key.description: password_key: Azure storage account access key
